Streamlined and automated DevOps for mobile apps

Appcircle transforms Mobile DevOps to Mobile "NoOps". All operations are handled by Appcircle with the best practices.

Easy and Streamlined Setup

Quick and Easy Start

Connect your repo from your preferred git provider; whether it is GitHub, BitBucket or an internal one and simply build your app.

Hassle-free Setup

Customize your build settings with a streamlined user interface with one-click access to all commonly used settings. Easy to setup, easy to use.

Workflow Support for Full Customization

For advanced and custom use cases, you can customize your build process with the workflows. You can customize any build step and utilize build scripts at different stages.

Environment Variables and Secrets

With the centralized environment variables module, manage all your variables and secrets from one place for all projects. Secrets are stored securely and not accessible for viewing while they can still be incorporated to the build.

Automated Cloud Build

Automation Done Right

No need for manual coding and constant monitoring for build automation and no need for a Mac or any other specific environment for builds. With different types of triggers, you have extensive control over when to get a build after a git push.

Support for Multiple Xcode Versions (Including Betas)

Select the Xcode version of your choice including beta versions and never worry about maintaining and upgrading separate environments for multiple projects. Switch to any supported version with just a single click.

Workflow Support for Full Customization

Support for popular frameworks for building: platform-based native, cross-platform native and hybrid and more.

Centralized Signing Identities

Generation and management of signing identities without the need for third-party tools

The identities in this module is accessible from the build module to use in multiple projects. No need to maintain the same identity separately for each build.

All types of iOS certificates are supported, Ad Hoc, Enterprise or Distribution along with multiple provisioning profile support for a project. Also, multi-alias keystores are supported for Android.

Flexible Deployment & Preview on Device

Latest Version Always Delivered Fresh

With the end-to-end workflows for the full mobile app lifecycle, you can automate the full mobile CI/CD process from code to the end user.

Different types of triggers provide you extensive control over when an app is shared with which testers or when it is uploaded directly to the public app stores or to the Enterprise App Store.

In-Browser App Previews on Virtual Devices

Preview your apps instantly on virtual iOS and Android devices in your browser. No need to install any emulators or maintain physical devices.

Test your builds before sending them to other modules with a single click. A wide range of iOS and Android devices and OS versions are supported.

Beta Testing Public Distribution

Appcircle Testing Distribution

Distribute your apps for testing with individual testers and testing teams without the need for third party solutions.

It is a full-featured testing platform to serve binaries with detailed management and tracking of applications, versions, testers and teams. You can also preview apps on virtual devices before sharing.

When you share the app, unique download links will be sent to each user and you can choose to have users enroll with their email address or use static authentication or no authentication at all.

Send to App Store Connect & TestFlight

Sign and deploy your apps to App Store Connect automatically for App Store or for TestFlight.

Send to Google Play

Sign and deploy your apps to Google Play automatically for public release or for Google Play beta testing.

Enterprise App Store

No Setup Needed

Start using the solution right away. No need for enrollment or complex MDM solutions. Suitable for BYOD cases.

Full Compatibility

Supports all types of mobile apps and frameworks: platform-based native, cross-platform native and hybrid and more.

Customizable Storefront

Customize your storefront with your company logo and colors and use your own domain.

SSO Integration

Support for enterprise authentication protocols: oAuth, LDAP, ADFS, etc. or simply use a static user.

Detailed Reporting

View all the details about the apps and the individual users.

Role Based Access

Provide selective access to the apps with the SSO roles and groups integration.

Scalable & Available

Fully scalable and highly available with a CDN for any number of users and concurrent downloads.

No need for low performance in-house solutions.

A solution for everyone.Whether you are a start-up or an enterprise,we got you covered

Use Appcircle as a service from the cloud or
deploy it on your private cloud or as an on-premise solution

Automate Your Mobile CI/CD Now
